caption: A girl is walking in a hallway painted in red, carrying bags, and enters a bedroom. The bedroom is eerie and terrifying. A ghost is peeping at the girl. Another man, also carrying bags, enters the room. He hands a cardboard box to the girl. While the girl is arranging her clothes, a little ghost appears behind her. The girl is immediately frightened and faints. The ghost tries to wake her up with water. The girl opens her eyes and screams loudly. Her screams attract the man. In the end, a group of ghosts is seen chatting in the room.
